name: Sentai Set / 勇者戦隊ブレイブレンジャーセット / 勇者戰隊勇氣連者套組 / Ensemble de super costumes
detailed_description:
Rangers! Unite!

The Sentai Set brings the Neptunia characters in a form of a Sentai Ranger!

The Sentai Set includes:
• Sentai Suit (Brave Purple): Neptune
• Sentai Suit (Brave Black): Noire
• Sentai Suit (Brave White): Blanc
• Sentai Suit (Brave Green): Vert
• Sentai Suit (Brave Dark): Chrome
• Sentai Suit (Brave Orange): Artisan
• Sentai Suit (Brave Blue): IF
• Sentai Suit (Brave Pink): Compa

*Note: The Sentai Set is purely cosmetic and is visible in battle and cutscenes. Mix-n-match with animal ears and tails for fun!
about_the_game:
Rangers! Unite!

The Sentai Set brings the Neptunia characters in a form of a Sentai Ranger!

The Sentai Set includes:
• Sentai Suit (Brave Purple): Neptune
• Sentai Suit (Brave Black): Noire
• Sentai Suit (Brave White): Blanc
• Sentai Suit (Brave Green): Vert
• Sentai Suit (Brave Dark): Chrome
• Sentai Suit (Brave Orange): Artisan
• Sentai Suit (Brave Blue): IF
• Sentai Suit (Brave Pink): Compa

*Note: The Sentai Set is purely cosmetic and is visible in battle and cutscenes. Mix-n-match with animal ears and tails for fun!
short_description: The Sentai Set gives 8x Sentai-themed costumes for your favorite Neptunia Goddesses!

fullgame.name: Super Neptunia RPG / 勇者ネプテューヌ /勇者戰機少女

supported_languages:
English*, French, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 32bit, 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
